title: Too much Cod, Ranked isn't team death match!! (bronze/Silver)
body:
Alright so at the moment I sit comfortably in B4, roughly a week or so ago I was S2 in promos, a sneaky bender with the lads started my downward spiral ( don't finish larry enders with league ). 

Now, I stopped caring once I  hit about S4 and my MMR was wood 8.5, so if someone gets salty and talks shit, I actually have a right laugh when I see "Defeat" and they have spilt the salt everywhere. So really, either ways a win when someone's being a fuck wit.
So no, I'm not complaining about my rank at all.

Now for all you bronze/silver who read this, understand that once you hit 50 kills, you DONT win, this is NOT team death match. Inhibs, Towers, Baron and Dragon are what matter. Getting to the nexus is what matters.

OBJECTIVES > KILLS also CS > poke

example - we kill 4 of them, I start baron, the other 3 who are up leave baron and chase a vayne for about 2 minutes. They baron, they win.

( No I never said I'm pro, yes I'm aware Silver and bronze are one big Wood div, just tyring to teach floppers to get on that first rung )

replies.body: Just Bocaj is my Username. I get a good 20-27 lp if i win in solo so my mmr is higher than my rank which is b3 and i understand the retarded bronze kids. I main Support, ADC, Mid
